text.title: River
text.text1: North: The river has an glacial period in winter, the amount of water is relatively small, and the sediment content is large.
text.text2: South: the river has no icing period, the water is rich, the mud The sand content is small.

text.title: cooked
text.text1: North: Northeast China is generally cooked every year, spring harvests. In the North China Plain, two crops a year, after winter wheat, corn, peanuts and other crops can be planted.
text.text2: South: two cooked or three cooked a year, rice in Lingnan, Taiwan and other places can be cooked three times a year.
